abstract: Microsoft plans to buy Rapt, plugging a hole in its suite of tools for Web publishers and advertisers, the software giant said Friday. Microsoft did not say what it would pay for the privately held San Francisco company.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft plans to buy Rapt, plugging a hole in its suite of tools for Web publishers and advertisers, the software giant said Friday. Microsoft did not say what it would pay for the privately held San Francisco company.

headline.main: Microsoft to Buy Web Ad Analysis Company
